metadata.description: Specifies the name of the storage account used for virtual machine disks. This has to be a unique name, up to 24 chars, all lowercase.
Specifies the marketplace publisher of the image to provision this machine on.
Specifies the marketplace offer of the image to provision this machine on.
Specifies the marketplace sku of the image to provision this machine on.
Specifies the size of the virtual machine.
Specifies the name of this machine in Azure and on the network.
Specifies the static IP to assign to this machine.
Specifies the availability set this machine should belong to.
Specifies the id of the subnet the machine should connect to.
Specifies a list of DNS servers the machine should use.
Specifies the id of the load balancer's back end address pool.
Specifies a list of inbound NAT rules to apply to this VM.
Specifies the name of the administrator for machines, Active Directory domain, NetScaler and XenApp. Exclusion list: 'admin','administrator'. Must be no more than 9 alphanumeric characters.
Specifies the password of the administrator for machines, Active Directory domain, NetScaler and XenApp.
Specifies the name of the Active Directory domain.
Specifies the name of the Active Directory domain controller on the virtual network.
Specifies the private IP of a domain controller on the virtual network.
Specifies the resource group location.
Specifies the base location of the child templates and desired state configuration scripts.
Specifies the shared access signature token which provides access to the base artifacts location.
Specifies the version of the DSC extension to use.
Specifies the URI of the DSC configuration script.
Specifies the function to be executed in the DSC configuration script.
